fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Culture and media, Competition, Consumers, Business and Industry, Regional Policy, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: Broadband policy, AVMS directive, State Aid, Universal Service, telecoms policy, copyright policy
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The aim of NLconnect is to promote and defend the Dutch broadband industry's policies and business interests, and to foster co-operation among its members. All members are active parts of the broadband value chain: companies that build and operate broadband networks and companies that provide services on this digital infrastructure as well as their suppliers. We promote innovation, mutual cooperation and knowledge exchange in this sector and promote shared interests among stakeholders.
